experience.title: President
experience.description: Aahar is inspired from the Robinhood Army which is an international organisation aimed at serving the poor and needy through unconsumed food distributionInspired and accompanied with 100 volunteers utilizing more than 20 kgs of surplus food of IIT Roorkee messes each week on an average feeding 100-200 people per driveCurrently distributing in 2 nearby slums around the IIT Roorkee campus facilitating  2 drives per weekWorked upon the "Neki ki Peti" campaign 2019 & 2020 wherein boxes are kept in hostels to collect clothes to be distributed in slums

experience.title: Head Finance
experience.description: Cognizance is the annual technical fest of IIT ROORKEE. It is one of the largest tech fest which has a footfall of more than 30,000. Advanced the association of varied corporates and startups engendering to a budget of 13 million INR for Cognizance '19.Managed the the total budget to meet the expenses as regards to logistics and event conduction during the festival.Organised first ever regional level India Skills competition of Uttarakhand State in coordination of UKSDM.Conducted first ever Uttarakhand Talent Search Examination coordinating with many schools witnessing 3500+ students.

experience.title: Quantitative Researcher
experience.description: Using Quantitative approach and developing Trading Algorithms (alphas) to deploy systematic investments strategies focused on market inefficiencies across the US, Asia, and Europe equities.Researching financial literature to seek out sources of alpha and aggregating these signals into robust models, with the objective of achieving high Sharpe ratios and significant returns.
